title: What is the importance of the guitar in music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Originally, I wasn’t thinking of answering this question because the best answer, the most accurate answer is “it all depends.” And that’s not really an answer, is it? But it all depends on what type of music you’re talking about, doesn’t it? If you’re talking about classic rock and roll, the guitar is very important. On the other hand, if you’re talking about Bach’s harpsichord etudes, it’s not important at all. So, the answer really depends on what type of music you’re talking about. Once you know that, you’ll almost automatically know what the importance of the guitar is.
